data.reason: D-link bouncing between frame FR007 cage CG04 (superNode SN001 drawer DR1) hub HB3 port $nodePort and frame FR007 cage CG03 (superNode SN001 drawer DR0) hub HB0 port $neighbor_nodePort (Bouncing D-Link)
data.recommendation:
There is a problem with a D-Link.
Record the alert ID.
Record the location in the alert message.
Contact IBM Service.
Log on to the Management Server.
To isolate to the proper FRU, run Link Diags and perform the actions that it recommends.
If no action is recommended, because Diags cannot isolate to the proper FRU, replace the FRUs in the order listed.

data.reason: LR-link bouncing between frame FR007 cage CG04 (superNode SN001 drawer DR1 ) hub HB3 port $remotePort and frame $neighbor_frame cage $neighbor_cage (superNode $neighbor_supernode drawer $neighbor_drawer) hub $neighbor_hub port $neighbor_remotePort (Bouncing LR-Link)
data.recommendation:
There is a problem with an LR-Link.
Record the alert ID.
Record the location in the alert message.
Contact IBM Service.
Log on to the Management Server.
To isolate to the proper FRU, run Link Diags and perform the actions that it recommends.
If no action is recommended, because Diags cannot isolate to the proper FRU, replace the FRUs in the order listed.

data.reason: LL-link down in frame FR007 cage CG04 (superNode SN001 drawer DR1) (Llocal Link Port Down)
data.recommendation:
There is a problem with a hub module.
Record the alert ID.
Record the location from the alert message.
Contact IBM Service.
Replace the the local reporting FRU according the FRU list.
